entry.title: Russian General Is Killed in Ukraine as Airstrikes Intensify
entry.content: Russian airstrikes pounded Ukrainian cities far from the front lines, as Russian troops abducted the mayor of an occupied city.

entry.title: Aid Groups Rush Supplies to Ukraine as Medicines Run Low
entry.content: Displaced Ukrainians are struggling to find treatments, as health facilities have come under attack during the war with Russia.

entry.title: In the Rubble of Kharkiv, Survivors Make Their Stand: 'It's a War, and It's a Dirty War'
entry.content: Russian missiles struck apartments, museums and libraries in Ukraineâ€™s second-largest city, once tilted toward Moscow, leaving residents to tend to the wounded and brace for what comes next.
